wikipedia_page.main: Niall Malcolm Stewart Macpherson, 1st Baron Drumalbyn   (3 August 1908 – 11 October 1987) was a Scottish Tory and National Liberal politician.

response: Niall Macpherson, 1st Baron Drumalbyn, was the nephew of the first Baron Strathcarron.
In 1962 Weatherall married Hon. Jean Stewart Macpherson, daughter of Niall Macpherson, 1st Baron Drumalbyn; they had two sons and three daughters. She died on 15 December 2021.
